summary: Comprehensive testing of FLUX-DNA AI-Native Psychometric Sanctuary completed. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all pages load correctly with proper integrations.

issues: Conversation UI layout could be wider on desktop - currently left-aligned with significant empty space on right

critical_code_review_comments: API client in frontend uses NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL correctly
All Claude AI integrations working with Emergent LLM key
Time-gate links using Upstash Redis REST API working correctly
seed_data_creation: None - tests use dynamic data creation
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs tested and working. Frontend pages (Homepage, Assessment, Sanctuary, Founder Dashboard) all load correctly. Claude AI integration (Al-Hakim and Al-Sheikha personas) working. Time-gate links with Upstash Redis working. Email service with Resend configured. The app is a Next.js 15 frontend with FastAPI backend.

features_tested.frontend_assessment: ✅ /assessment page shows language selection and starts assessment
